entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023
